ShopDescription.VoidChicken: An odd and menancing chicken. Well cared-for adult chickens lay one void egg every day.
ShopDescription.GoldenChicken: A gaudy and aureate chicken. Well cared-for adult chickens lay one golden egg every day.
ShopDescription.Dinosaur: The littlest dinosaur. Well cared-for adult dinosaur lay one dinosaur egg every week.
